text: WHAT IS THIS? DO NOT HOVER ME! ONLY MIGHTY NAGASH CAN HOVER.
Ports can generate income and growth, along with facilitating trade with factions from afar.
Easily recognised from a distance, and unique to their home regions, landmarks enable travellers – and armies – to get their bearings.
Dark magic surges through huge obsidian stuctures that tower over the land.
Accursed places where a necrotic energy seeps through all things, dead, living and in-between.
A mighty Stronghold built by the tireless labour of countless Undead.
The dead lay here, waiting for a master to guide them.
